text: Rappin' Hood is a Brazilian rapper. He was born in São Paulo, Brazil on June 5, 1972. ==Recent events== In 2008, signed to TV Cultura to present the program Manos e Minas appears on Wednesdays and 19h 30 min. However, he left the program in April 2009, leaving the command of the same for the rapper Thaíde. == References == Category:Brazilian rappers Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from São Paulo
title: Rappin' Hood
